content: a very up to the minute project bonnie cabled earwarmer headband ~ for aran weight or dk yarn you can knit this with ~ aran weight yarn 10ply worsted weight and 5mm needles ~ around 40g required for a cosy earwarmer or dk yarn 8ply light worsted and 4mm needles ~ around 20g required for a lighter weight earwarmer a lovely gift idea - all my friends love them this is a friday fun project - from time to time i add a pattern onto my blog on a friday and members of my facebook group enjoy knitting the same thing over the weekend and then comparing the results it is fun to see the finished projects and how differently they turn out depending on the yarn chosen enjoy the fun **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
